abstracts.cdata!:
The development objectives of the Second
            Land Administration and Management Project for Philippines
            are to increase land tenure security and improve land
            administration services through the implementation of
            institutional and legal reform, the realization of an
            accelerated land titling program, and the establishment of a
            fair and uniform property valuation system. The closing date
            of the project will be extended from December 31, 2012 to
            September 30, 2013. The purpose of this further extension to
            the loan closing date is to enable the government to secure
            the necessary approvals for the additional financing. This
            will be the third extension of the project.
